4397.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers ATK

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

4398.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 5 turns, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
